title: Romanian producer Ada Solomon elected chair of the European Film Academy board | Romania Insider
snippet: Producer Ada Solomon has been elected chair of the board of the European Film Academy, marking the highest level of representation the Romanian film industry has achieved within the institution.

title: Producer Ada Solomon elected European Film Academy board chair - AGERPRES
snippet: Producer Ada Solomon, recognised for a career of more than 25 years in film, has been elected board chair of the European Film Academy following votes cast by more than 5,400 members. According to a press release sent to AGERPRES on Thursday, with Ada Solomon's appointment Romania is now ...

title: European Film Academy Announces New Board Appointments - European Film Academy
snippet: It is a time of change, and I am ready to take the challenge knowing that I am backed up by the great executive team of the Academy and the amazing people in the board of the European Film Academy, and especially the newly elected deputy chairs: Leontine Petit and Matthieu Darras.”
